description_for_human: Access comprehensive information about building products using AI coding assistants. Learn how to use tools like Cursor, Bolt, and Lovable to create production-ready applications as a non-technical founder.
description_for_model: Provides detailed information about product development using AI coding assistants, including case studies, technical tutorials, and implementation guides. Focuses on helping non-technical founders build and launch digital products.
examples: How do I start building a product with Cursor AI?
Show me case studies of successful products built with AI coding assistants
What are the best practices for using AI to write code?
How can I deploy my AI-built application to production?
